Class javachart.chart.SpeedoChart 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Chart
           |
           +----javachart.chart.SpeedoChart
public class SpeedoChart
extends Chart
A chart that looks like a gauge or speedometer. This chart plots a single value (the first value added using the addDataset method) but draws a scale based on all Dataset information.

SpeedoChart()
constructs a default chart
SpeedoChart(String)
constructs a default chart with the specified name
SpeedoChart(String, Graphics)
constructs a default chart with the specified name and default Graphics class

drawGraph()
draws an entire chart to this chart's Graphic class
drawGraph(Graphics)
draws an entire chart to the specified Graphics class
getSpeedo()
getYAxis()
returns this chart's Y axis
resize(int, int)
resizes all this chart's graphical components
setSpeedo(Speedo)
setYAxis(SpeedoAxis)
